ENSINO.NOME-CURSO: GÉNIE DES MATÉRIAUX ET DE LA MÉTALLURGIE
Maîtrise en Génie des Mat. et de la Métallurgie
Doctorat en Génie des Mat. et de la Métallurgie

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: The CHU de Québec Research Center include 550 scientists in 7 Division. The Division of Regenerative Medicine inlcude close to 60 scientists and 500 HQPs from Medicine, Pharmacy. Dentistry, Sciences and Engineering, and Social Sciences Schools from Université Laval. It is a highly transversal division, from laboratory to clinics.
VINCULOS.OUTRO-ENQUADRAMENTO-FUNCIONAL-INFORMADO: Adjunct Director of Regenerative Medicine Div

ATUACAO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Journal of Biocompatible Materials and Coatings Peter de Gruyter

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Editor, open access and paper journal, devoted to this grey zone science (especially Coatings).
Member of Editorial Board, the 3rd in Biomaterials Science.

ATUACAO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-INSTITUICAO: International Journal of Tissue Science & Engineering
Journal of Bioengineering and Biomedical Science
Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: After having being awarded of a CRC-I, I was invited to seat on this NSERC Interdisciplinary Committee involving members of the three Canada Councils.
This non-profit French Organization awards 3,5M Euro per year to Biongineering multidisciplinary projects submitted by French scientists.
Member of the TechSan committee at ANR.

I was Co-Chair of this committee due to my expertise in Bioengineering, and the other co-chair was a pharmacologist. 50M Euro were awarded to some 8 projects in partnership with regulatory, industrial and academic partners.
